Development

# Clone Repo git clone https://github.com/rackerlabs/zoolander cd zoolander gem install bundler bundle install npm install bower install

Build

grunt build:[theme]

Available themes:

  • global
  • derek

Docs

npm start Server address: http://127.0.0.1:9000/ Server running... press ctrl-c to stop.
